danfulea.math.numerical

Class Complex

  • java.lang.Object
    • danfulea.math.numerical.Complex

  • public class Complex
extends java.lang.Object
    Complex number class. Based on literature, including Numerical Recipes in C (Cambridge Univ.).
    Author:
    Dan Fulea, 09 OCT. 2006.
